title: Augier

Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radio_info.short: Radio St. Lucia, formerly operating under the aegis of the St. Lucia Broadcasting Corporation Radio St. Lucia was converted from a statutory corporation to a
radio_info.rest:
limited liability company on November 08, 1999. Radio St. Lucia Company Ltd. is wholly owned by the Government of Saint Lucia.
 
Popularly known as "The Nation's Station" RSL is mandated to provide public service broadcasting, although earning its keep from advertising. In many ways a pioneer in local broadcasting, RSL has provided the foundation for much of what obtains in local broadcast circles. Many of the programmes and current crop of broadcasters across the media landscape had their beginnings at Radio St. Lucia.
 
RSL's programming features a wide range of offerings in culture, health, agriculture, news and current affairs, sports, music and public information. We continue to lead all stations in news, sports, religious, cultural and Kwéyòl language programming and local music output. And through our OECS Newslink programme we keep St. Lucia up to date on what happens in our sister territories.
 
Our News Nationwide at 1 p.m. continues to be a staple for a many and our extensive coverage Calypso, Carnival, Emancipation Day, the La Rose, La Maguerite Festivals and of national events, is unrivalled. So too, our Christmas programming which provides a new talking point each year.

------
Shows: BBC World News, Caribbean Report
